collapse_level[source]

collapse_level(df, categorical_vars, keep_level=20)

Collapse levels for categorical variables with high cardinality.

This operation identifies categorical variables with high cardinality and combine into levels that have both high target rates and frequency. The number of levels to keep is defined by user.

Parameters

df : pandas dataframe, required Dataframe to process

categorical_vars : list, required A list of categorical variables that will go through the treatment process

keep_level : int, required Used to select high cardinality variables which exceed the specified level and collapse existing levels to this range.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cat_treat.reduce_cardinality[source]

cat_treat.reduce_cardinality(keep_level=20)

Collapse levels for categorical variables with high cardinality.

This operation identifies categorical variables with high cardinality and combine into levels that have both high target rates and frequency. The number of levels to keep is defined by user.

Parameters

df : pandas dataframe, required Dataframe to process

categorical_vars : list, required A list of categorical variables that will go through the treatment process

keep_level : int, required Used to select high cardinality variables which exceed the specified level and collapse existing levels to this range.
